title: Microsoft | Senior MLE | L63 | Bangalore, India
content:
* Education: BTech in non-CS, non-circuit from tier 1 college. Ongoing online masters in a reputed US university. 
* YOE: 5
* Prior Experience: 5 years as MLE/Data scientist, mix of MNC + startups
* Data of Offer: July 7, 2024
* Company: Microsoft
* Title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Level 63
* Location: Bangalore
* Compensation:
	* Base: 45 LPA
	* Joining: 3 lakhs
	* Stock: $60,000 for 4 years ($15000 PA)
	* Bonus: upto 30%
	* TC: assuming 15% bonus, ~65 lpa
* Previous TC: 35 lpa fixed + 3 lpa bonus
* Benefits: standrand MS benefits

I don't have any other offer as of now, but interviewing with few non-FAANG companies. 
Should I accept the offer? is there any room for negotiation?
